MetaInfo.Name: Decision Tree
MetaInfo.Description:
Predict a target variable using one or more predictor variables that are expected to have an influence on the target variable by constructing a set of if-then split rules that optimize a criteria.
If the target variable identifies membership in one of a set of categories, a classification tree is constructed (based on Gini coefficient) to maximize the 'purity' at each split.
If the target variable is a continuous variable, a regression tree is constructed using the split criteria of 'minimize the sum of the squared errors' at each split.
